articles.author: Bill Keveney
articles.title: 'Cobra Kai': 'Karate Kid' spinoff moves to Netflix; third season coming soon - USA TODAY
articles.description: "Cobra Kai" is moving, with Netflix becoming the home for the first two seasons of "The Karate Kid" spinoff. It already was renewed for Season 3.
articles.content:
Daniel LaRusso (Ralph Macchio) and Johnny Lawrence (William Zabka) head rival dojos in the exclusive trailer for Season 2 of YouTube's "Cobra Kai."
USA TODAY

articles.title: Watch Chris D'Elia's Shocked Reaction to Finding Out Snapchats Can Be Saved - Newsweek

articles.author: Alaa Elassar, CNN
articles.title: Tom Petty's family issues a cease and desist order to Trump campaign - CNN
articles.description: The family of the late Tom Petty has filed a cease and desist notice to the Trump campaign after one of the musician's songs was played at the President's campaign rally in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
